title: # 313 - Rocky Dale Davis & ME
description:
I sit down in the man cave with comedian Rocky Dale Davis to talk about sober Octobert, the southern momma drama, getting stoned in NJ, fighting, touring with Ralphie May, and Rocky's new special.

Check out Rocky Dale Davis's special on Epix "Unprotected Sets (S1 Ep 4)"

This episode is brought to you by Zip Recruiter. Try Zip Recruiter for free today by going to www.ziprecruiter.com/bertcast
